name: places/ChIJM_5XhoBZwokRLDmAhZHxp3Y
formattedAddress: 107 MacDougal St Unit 201A, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 107 MacDougal St Unit 201A, New York, NY 10012-1242, USA

originalText.text: Been a couple of times and the massage isn't bad but both times, once it finished, they've refused to allow me to leave without paying a $20 'tip'. I offered $10 on a $50 massage, which is 20%, but they flat said no and insisted on 40% - which is madness. My fault for going back, thinking it was just one pushy masseur. Someone needs to explain what a tip is.

text.text: Been a couple of times and the massage isn't bad but both times, once it finished, they've refused to allow me to leave without paying a $20 'tip'. originalText.text: Customer service was great. They were super nice and kept making sure you were okay and comfortable. However, no matter how many times I told her to go softer it was still rough. I woke up the next day with even more pain.. my neck and shoulders are killing me. Not much time was spent on my legs either it was mostly the back. At some points it felt good but during some parts I was waiting for it to be over. Overall, I do not recommend but if you’re the type that is seeking a massage on the rougher side then this is the place for you.

originalText.text: SoHo Spa is unprofessional. I confirmed my appointment earlier in the day for 4pm. Then they called me back and said they couldn't do 4pm, only 5pm. I get there at 4:45pm for 5pm appointment and they tell me I'm early. They don't know what to do with me so they put me in a treatment room and then tell me I have to wait until 5:30p, while they're giggling. They are speaking to their boss in the treatment room next door through the thin fake walls so you can hear everything from the surrounding treatment rooms. The receptionist said she got the time wrong while giggling. I did not stay and will not come back.

originalText.text: Took us in at a moments notice and the massage was lovely. Will definitely come back.

text.text: Took us in at a moments notice and the massage was lovely. Will definitely come back.

originalText.text: Excellent experience there!! Lina is always my favorite therapist when I go every time.
